detectors.description:
Reentrancy in EtherLotto.play() (time_manipulation/ether_lotto.sol#33-57):
	External calls:
	- bank.transfer(FEE_AMOUNT) (time_manipulation/ether_lotto.sol#49)
	- msg.sender.transfer(pot - FEE_AMOUNT) (time_manipulation/ether_lotto.sol#52)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pot = 0 (time_manipulation/ether_lotto.sol#55)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [EtherLotto.play()](time_manipulation/ether_lotto.sol#L33-L57):
	External calls:
	- [bank.transfer(FEE_AMOUNT)](time_manipulation/ether_lotto.sol#L49)
	- [msg.sender.transfer(pot - FEE_AMOUNT)](time_manipulation/ether_lotto.sol#L52)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [pot = 0](time_manipulation/ether_lotto.sol#L55)
